page.title: 12VAYNOR FIRST SCHOOL REDDITCH
page.content: We interviewed{Mrs. Carlton}our headteacher to get information about our school and the area around it, during the last 12 years while she has been the head, to see what things have changed. The school was built in 1968 and{Mrs. {Carlton}in 1973, there were 9 classes but the numbers dropped to 6, and shot up to 12 in 1985. The numbers have risen because of the new houses and more children coming to live in the area. We also have a mobile classroom, and we will have 2 more in September 1985. There was much open space around the school in 1968, and you could see the Malvern Hills. There used to be a farm close by, but it was built upon.More space around the school has been used. It would be a pity to see any more changes which would spoil surroundings
